title: Night Riders, 3D Arcade Racing v1.001
description:
Night Riders is a 3D motorbike racing game inspired by 80's arcade classics.

If you like this game, please take the time to rate it / share it on your social networks, thanks :)

Features :

- Fast 3D graphics using OpenGL, awesome in HD !
- Ride through 8 beautiful tracks and 3 challenging courses. More coming soon !
- Support for on-screen multi-touch controls, digital gamepads and analog sticks (analog require Android 3.1+).
- Many configuration options are available to adapt it to your device and needs.

What's New:

v1.001:
- Fix for the road glitches on some devices.
- The ingame menu now have drop shadows and is more visible.
